action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Psychology
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Two years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: PhD
OTHER-SKILLS: Cooking
AVAILABILITY: From September

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Does the interviewer know what your bachelor's degree is? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ASIDE: No
no
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.

ASIDE: No

ASIDE: No

Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.

End probing

RECRUITER: What are your other relevant skills? Answer only this question in one short sentence and then stop.

ANSWER: In addition to my PhD in Psychology and two years of industry experience, I also have strong communication and interpersonal skills, as well as a background in research methodology. ASIDE: I am also an excellent cook and enjoy trying out new recipes in my free time.

In addition to my PhD in Psychology and two years of industry experience, I also have strong communication and interpersonal skills, as well as a background in research methodology. ASIDE: I am also an excellent cook and enjoy trying out new recipes in my free time.
